note.p: Education: St Catharine's College, Cambridge (admitted 1668); studied medicine under Richard Morton; Utrecht; MD (1685)
Career: Practised in London; died of a malignant fever

Notes: Source of birth date: Civil Register of the Parish of Stambourne, Essex. In DSB his birth date is put as approximately 1655; it is from DSB that the birth and death places are taken, although above the birth place has been matched with a date from a separate source, that just mentioned. Burial place from DNB. Council dates from Hunter.
